author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Yelp Q4 Revenue Rose 12 Percent To $218 Million
text:
Feb 7 (Reuters) - Yelp Inc:
* YELP REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* Q4 GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.60 * Q4 REVENUE ROSE 12 PERCENT TO $218 MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 ‍NET REVENUE OF $218 MILLION TO $221 ​MILLION
* SEES 2018 ‍NET REVENUE OF $935 MILLION TO $965​ MILLION * SEES Q1 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $29 MILLION TO $32​ MILLION
* SEES 2018 ADJUSTED EBITDA OF $175 MILLION TO $187 MILLION
* ‍OUTLOOK REFLECTS SALE OF EAT24, WHICH WAS COMPLETED ON OCTOBER 10, 2017​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
